name: Thumb Car Racing- Real Formula Racing Car Games
name_original: Thumb Car Racing- Real Formula Racing Car Games
description:
Have you ever wanted to be the fastest real formula car racer? Well now you can!!
Pick your wanted formula car and join the extreme racing challenge. Race head to head with opponents cars to become a racing champion. Turbo formula racing car’s gear is in full throttle and the foot is on the pedal, all you have to do is take control and drive your real super cars on some of the fastest racing tracks around. Realize your dream with this free, fast, and action packed formula cars racing game. With this high speed racing game you will think that you are a a real driver of furious super cars racing. Zoom around in the fastest cars on three different tracks - each difficult than the previous one - and three distinct surroundings to enhance your driving pleasure.
Real turbo formula racing has been made for the lovers of speed. Drive your automatic real super formula cars around the 3d challenging environment, spin around corners, drifting, crushing, and do as much as you can.

If you like full and free racing games, challenges and the smell of the asphalt, real formula racing is perfect for you!

How to Play:
- Move the car left and right by swiping left and right.
- Pick up fuel tanks to full your fuel tanks.
- Powerups like slow mo will slow down and boost will boost your car.
- Collect virtual cash from the track to unlock new cars

Features:
- free offline racing and well as drifting game.
- Multiple camera angles to enhance the view.
- Excellent formula car physics and controls implemented.
- realistic 3d graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing racing effects.
- User friendly gui and controls.
- Different daytime conditions.
- real adventuring environments looks like racing movies.
